# Ignore directories and files generated by most programming languages and development tools

# Ignore system and IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.suo
*.user
*.sln.docstates
thumbs.db

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore package managers
node_modules/
vendor/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# Ignore logs and temporary files
*.log
*.log.*
*.tmp
*.swp

# Ignore compiled binary files
*.pyc
__pycache__/

# Ignore database files
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3

# Ignore editor-specific files
*.sublime-*
*.sublime-workspace
*.code-workspace

# Ignore project-specific files and directories
/config.js
/secret_config.js
.env

# Ignore compiled output
/dist/
/build/
/out/

# Ignore dependency files
composer.lock
yarn.lock
package-lock.json

# Ignore environment-specific configuration
.env.local
.env.development
.env.test
.env.production

# Ignore macOS directory metadata
.AppleDouble
.DS_Store
